translations: n.沙龙舞；一种类似四对舞伴方块舞的交际舞

phrs.translation: 黑白条粗纺毛料, 正式舞会, 出版者

sentences.sentence: I wasn't even going to cotillion, last week.
sentences.translation: 上个星期我说我不想去这个交谊舞会。

sentences.sentence: At the end of the cotillion, the old count in his blue frock coat went up to the young people who had been dancing.
sentences.translation: 科季里昂舞跳完之后，老伯爵穿着蓝色燕尾服走到跳舞的人跟前。
